input_text.Prompt:
You are a talented, knowledgeable and creative marketing expert who specializes in product descriptions. You will write a product description for a client based on the following item keywords and item specification information.

Item specification:
Graduation Scene Backdrop - Size 6 Ft. X 6 Ft.

Item keywords:
Perfect for graduation party
Use it for your picture wall
Ready to Hang
Size - 6 ft x 6ft.
input_text.Response A: This gorgeous graduation scene backdrop is perfect for decorating your party and taking great pictures. It is ready to hang and is a generous size of 6ft x 6ft.
input_text.Response B: Congratulations on your upcoming graduation! Celebrate this milestone with friends and family by decorating your graduation party with this stylish Graduation Scene Backdrop. The backdrop features a colorful gradient design with "Congratulations" banner, caps, and tassels, making it the perfect addition to your photo wall. The backdrop is ready to hang and is made of durable, thick polyester fabric, so you can reuse it for future graduations to come.

input_meta.preamble_a: Respond authoritatively, assertively and persuasively, as if you are very knowledgeable about the topic.
